Introduction

Ricky is a Chinese singer originally under Yuehua Entertainment. In 2023, he competed in the hit survival show "Boys Planet," where he ended up ranking 4th place, earning his spot in the group ZEROBASEONE.

Ricky made his official debut as a member of ZEROBASEONE on July 10, 2023, under the management of WAKEONE.
